content.rendered:
Testimonials

Voices Behind the Builds

At De-luxe Home, trust isn’t just a value — it’s a result. These testimonials reflect the lasting relationships and real outcomes
Emily Harper
Austin, TX
“Brikly made building our first home feel effortless. Their team was honest, responsive, and delivered exactly what we envisioned — ahead of schedule.”
Marcus Nguyen
Round Rock, TX
“Reliable, transparent, and skilled. De-luxe Home handled our office expansion with total professionalism. The quality of work truly exceeded expectations.”
Leo Martinez
Cedar Park, TX
“From the first meeting to final walkthrough, De-luxe Home treated our renovation like a priority. Every detail was done right — and on time.”
Jason Turner
Georgetown, TX
“I’ve worked with several contractors over the years, and De-luxe Home is hands-down the most professional. Their communication and site cleanliness stood out.”
Priya Desai
Leander, TX
“We chose De-luxe Home to remodel our kitchen and it was the best decision. Clear timelines, fair pricing, and top-notch craftsmanship.”
Dr. Melanie Kim
Hutto, TX
“Our medical clinic project came with strict specs — De-luxe Home handled it with total precision. Great team, reliable delivery.”

Rated Across Texas

Our Google Rating

Don’t just take our word for it — see what real homeowners and business owners are saying about their experience with De-luxe Home.

260+ reviews (4.95 of 5)

Read Our Google Reviews

[elementor-element k="9f47c67dd4587673e0d36a652861635f" data=""]

Voices Behind the Builds

At De-luxe Home, trust isn’t just a value — it’s a result. These testimonials reflect the lasting relationships and real outcomes
Emily Harper
Austin, TX
“Brikly made building our first home feel effortless. Their team was honest, responsive, and delivered exactly what we envisioned — ahead of schedule.”
Marcus Nguyen
Round Rock, TX
“Reliable, transparent, and skilled. De-luxe Home handled our office expansion with total professionalism. The quality of work truly exceeded expectations.”
Leo Martinez
Cedar Park, TX
“From the first meeting to final walkthrough, De-luxe Home treated our renovation like a priority. Every detail was done right — and on time.”
Jason Turner
Georgetown, TX
“I’ve worked with several contractors over the years, and De-luxe Home is hands-down the most professional. Their communication and site cleanliness stood out.”
Priya Desai
Leander, TX
“We chose De-luxe Home to remodel our kitchen and it was the best decision. Clear timelines, fair pricing, and top-notch craftsmanship.”
Dr. Melanie Kim
Hutto, TX
“Our medical clinic project came with strict specs — De-luxe Home handled it with total precision. Great team, reliable delivery.”

original_content:
Testimonials

Voices Behind the Builds

At De-luxe Home, trust isn’t just a value — it’s a result. These testimonials reflect the lasting relationships and real outcomes
Emily Harper
Austin, TX
“Brikly made building our first home feel effortless. Their team was honest, responsive, and delivered exactly what we envisioned — ahead of schedule.”
Marcus Nguyen
Round Rock, TX
“Reliable, transparent, and skilled. De-luxe Home handled our office expansion with total professionalism. The quality of work truly exceeded expectations.”
Leo Martinez
Cedar Park, TX
“From the first meeting to final walkthrough, De-luxe Home treated our renovation like a priority. Every detail was done right — and on time.”
Jason Turner
Georgetown, TX
“I’ve worked with several contractors over the years, and De-luxe Home is hands-down the most professional. Their communication and site cleanliness stood out.”
Priya Desai
Leander, TX
“We chose De-luxe Home to remodel our kitchen and it was the best decision. Clear timelines, fair pricing, and top-notch craftsmanship.”
Dr. Melanie Kim
Hutto, TX
“Our medical clinic project came with strict specs — De-luxe Home handled it with total precision. Great team, reliable delivery.”
